Description (if potion): A potion that brings a rush of sweetness and energy, revitalizing the drinker.
An intense potion that ignites inner strength, enhancing physical prowess and agility
Imbues the drinker with the lightness of a feather, granting temporary levitation or slow descent
Chills the body to resist extreme temperatures, granting immunity to frostbite and cold
Infused with the magic of nature, it heals wounds and bolsters vitality with the essence of the forest
Provides a surge of energy and mental clarity, banishing fatigue and sharpening focus
Emits a comforting warmth, protecting against the biting cold and soothing tired muscles
Refreshes the body with pure hydration, restoring stamina and replenishing lost fluids
Cools the blood and enhances endurance, granting resilience against heat and exhaustion
Strengthens the earth within, granting temporary superhuman strength and resilience
Grants the essence of the forest, offering protection from harm and fostering a connection with nature
Calms the mind and body, alleviating stress and promoting relaxation
Conjures a protective aura of fire, warding off darkness and providing warmth in the coldest of nights
Harnesses the power of frostbloom flowers, granting resistance to ice-based attacks and ailments
Fortifies the drinker's resolve and resilience, granting immunity to fear and bolstering courage in the face of adversity
